ModMetaData.name: Meme-Superpack - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: MrSamuelStreamer, Feldoh, TheCatLover366
ModMetaData.description: Mr Samuel Stream Expanded Universe meme superpack.\n\nHave you ever wanted all the silly nonsense of a Mr Samuel Streamer series in one pack then oh boy you found the right mod. (This is the dev version of Meme-Superpack. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
